memberdef.argsstring: (double ikP, double ikD, double ikF, double ikSF, std::unique_ptr< VelMath > ivelMath, const TimeUtil &itimeUtil, std::unique_ptr< Filter > iderivativeFilter=std::make_unique< PassthroughFilter >(), const std::shared_ptr< Logger > &ilogger=Logger::getDefaultLogger())
memberdef.name: IterativeVelPIDController

detaileddescription.para: Velocity PD controller.

parameterdescription.para: a feed-forward gain to counteract static friction
The VelMath used for calculating velocity.
a filter for filtering the derivative term
The logger this instance will log to.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Gains &igains, std::unique_ptr< VelMath > ivelMath, const TimeUtil &itimeUtil, std::unique_ptr< Filter > iderivativeFilter=std::make_unique< PassthroughFilter >(), const std::shared_ptr< Logger > &ilogger=Logger::getDefaultLogger())
memberdef.name: IterativeVelPIDController

detaileddescription.para: Velocity PD controller.

parameterdescription.para: The VelMath used for calculating velocity.
a filter for filtering the derivative term
The logger this instance will log to.

detaileddescription.para: Do one iteration of the controller. Returns the reading in the range [-1, 1] unless the bounds have been changed with setOutputLimits().
Sets the target for the controller.
Writes the value of the controller output. This method might be automatically called in another thread by the controller. The range of input values is expected to be [-1, 1].

parameterdescription.para: the controller's output in the range [-1, 1]

detaileddescription.para: Gets the last set target, or the default target if none was set.
Returns the last calculated output of the controller.
Get the upper output bound.
Get the lower output bound.
Returns the last error of the controller. Does not update when disabled.
Returns whether the controller has settled at the target. Determining what settling means is implementation-dependent.
If the controller is disabled, this method must return true.
Set time between loops in ms.
Set controller output bounds. Default bounds are [-1, 1].
Sets the (soft) limits for the target range that controllerSet() scales into. The target computed by controllerSet() is scaled into the range [-itargetMin, itargetMax].

parameterdescription.para: The new max target for controllerSet().
The new min target for controllerSet().

detaileddescription.para: Resets the controller's internal state so it is similar to when it was first initialized, while keeping any user-configured information.
Changes whether the controller is off or on. Turning the controller on after it was off will cause the controller to move to its last set target, unless it was reset in that time.
Sets whether the controller is off or on. Turning the controller on after it was off will cause the controller to move to its last set target, unless it was reset in that time.
Returns whether the controller is currently disabled.

simplesect.para: whether the controller is currently disabled

detaileddescription.para: Get the last set sample time.
Do one iteration of velocity calculation.
Set controller gains.
Gets the current gains.
Sets the number of encoder ticks per revolution. Default is 1800.

parameterdescription.para: number of measured units per revolution

detaileddescription.para: Returns the current velocity.
